flavorText:
"Tread carefully! The last time I walked this path, half the snowdrifts were, in fact, sleeping trolls. I've never run so fast in my life!"
—Iskene, Kannah storyteller

foreignData.flavorText:
„Pass auf, wo du hintrittst! Als ich das letzte Mal diesen Weg gegangen bin, waren die Hälfte der Schneewehen in Wirklichkeit schlafende Trolle. Ich bin noch nie in meinem Leben so schnell gerannt!"
—Iskene, Kannah-Geschichtenerzählerin
foreignData.name: Hochlandwald
foreignData.text:
({T}: Erzeuge {R} oder {G}.)
Der Hochlandwald kommt getappt ins Spiel.

foreignData.flavorText:
"¡Caminen con cuidado! La última vez que tomé este camino, la mitad de los ventisqueros en realidad eran troles durmiendo. ¡Nunca corrí tan deprisa!".
—Iskene, cuentacuentos kannah
foreignData.name: Bosque de las tierras altas
foreignData.text:
({T}: Agrega {R} o {G}.)
El Bosque de las tierras altas entra al campo de batalla girado.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Attention ! La dernière fois que j'ai pris ce chemin, la moitié des congères était en fait des trolls endormis. Je n'ai jamais couru si vite de toute ma vie ! »
—Iskene, conteuse des Kannah
foreignData.name: Forêt des hautes terres
foreignData.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {R} ou {G}.)
La Forêt des hautes terres arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Attento a dove metti i piedi! L'ultima volta che ho preso questo sentiero, la metà dei mucchi di neve in realtà erano troll addormentati. Non ho mai corso così forte in tutta la mia vita!"
—Iskene, cantastorie Kannah
foreignData.name: Foresta dell'Altopiano
foreignData.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {R} o {G}.)
La Foresta dell'Altopiano entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.

foreignData.flavorText:
「警戒して進みましょう！前回この路を歩いたときには、吹き溜まりに見えた半数が、実際には寝ているトロールでした。あれほど速く走ったことはありません！」
――カナーの語り部、イスキン
foreignData.name: 高地の森
foreignData.text:
（{T}：{R}か{G}を加える。）
高地の森はタップ状態で戦場に出る。

foreignData.flavorText:
"주의깊게 전진해! 지난 번에 이 길을 지나갈 때에는 눈더미 중에 절반이 실제로는 잠자고 있던 트롤이었어. 내 평생 그렇게 빨리 달렸던 적이 없다고!"
—카나 이야기꾼, 이스킨
foreignData.name: 고지대 숲
foreignData.text:
({T}: {R} 또는 {G}를 추가한다.)
고지대 숲은 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Avance com cuidado! Da última vez que percorri esta trilha, metade dos montes de neve eram, na verdade, trols adormecidos. Nunca corri tão rápido em minha vida!"
— Iskene, contadora de histórias kannah
foreignData.name: Floresta das Terras Altas
foreignData.text:
({T}: Adicione {R} ou {G}.)
Floresta das Terras Altas entra no campo de batalha virada.

foreignData.flavorText:
«Ступай осторожно! В последний раз, когда я шла этим путем, половина сугробов оказалась спящими троллями. Никогда в жизни я так быстро не бегала!»
— Искени, каннская сказительница
foreignData.name: Горный Лес
foreignData.text:
({T}: добавьте {R} или {G}.)
Горный Лес выходит на поле битвы повернутым.

foreignData.flavorText:
「下脚的时候当心点！我上次走这条路时，这里至少有一半的雪堆是熟睡的巨魔。我这辈子从没跑得那么快！」
～卡纳说书人伊斯琴
foreignData.name: 高地树林
foreignData.text:
（{T}：加{R}或{G}。）
高地树林须横置进战场。

foreignData.flavorText:
「下腳的時候當心點！我上次走這條路時，這裡至少有一半的雪堆是熟睡的巨魔。我這輩子從沒跑得那麼快！」
～卡納說書人伊斯琴
foreignData.name: 高地樹林
foreignData.text:
（{T}：加{R}或{G}。）
高地樹林須橫置進戰場。

name: Highland Forest
originalText:
({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)
Highland Forest enters the battlefield tapped.

rulings.text: Snow is a supertype, not a card type. It has no rules meaning or function by itself, but spells and abilities may refer to it.
The {S} symbol is a generic mana symbol. It represents a cost that can be paid by one mana that was produced by a snow source. That mana can be any color or colorless.
Snow isn't a type of mana. If an effect says you may spend mana as though it were any type, you can't pay for {S} using mana that wasn't produced by a snow source.
Some cards have additional effects for each {S} spent to cast them. You can cast these spells even if you don't spend any snow mana to cast them; their additional effects simply won't do anything.

The Kaldheim set doesn't have any cards with mana costs that include {S}, but some previous sets do. If an effect says such a spell costs {1} less to cast, that reduction doesn't apply to any {S} costs. This is also true for activated abilities that include {S} in their activation costs and effects that reduce those costs.

text:
({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)
Highland Forest enters the battlefield tapped.
